attributes.action: legislate that all police car drivers to be subject to speeding fines if caught speeding without blue lights on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the last year 90,000 police cars were caught by speed cameras. Only 354 were prosecuted for speeding, despite 67,500 of these images showing that the police cars involved did not have blue lights on, i.e. were on "normal" duty. The police must be made to adhere to the same rules of the road that applies to all subjects when NOT on pursuit or when attending incidents. This will raise over £4 million in revenue alone and will restore public confidence in a judiciary system that looks increasingly two-tiered.
